channel.title: [PI]317 webclient problem probably a quick fix
channel.description:
I jarred client and the client.jar works on my desktop, I can run it and play on the server, but when I upload it to my host, and make the html for it, It doesn't work, it says unexpected error -retrying in [] seconds. this is my html file that summons the jar: [code] Dubeast-Pkz Webclient

Dubeast-Pkz Webclient
By Drew [/code]
